title: Quiz 8: Community Resources
description: Identifying the '4 Ms' and appropriate technologies for HBC.

questions.question: Resources for HBC are broadly classified into four categories known as the '4 Ms'. These are Money, Materials, Manpower, and ___BLANK___.
questions.explanation: The 4Ms are Money, Materials, Manpower, and Minutes (Time).
questions.hint: Another word for Time starting with M.

questions.question: Match the source to the resource they provide:
questions.explanation: Families provide daily basics; Communities provide support; Patients provide the setting.
questions.hint: Who provides the house? Who provides the food?

questions.question: Which of the following are examples of 'Appropriate Technology' (low cost) for HBC? (Select all that apply)

options.text: Leaky tin (tippy tap) for hand washing

questions.explanation: Appropriate technologies are low-tech, locally sustainable solutions like solar dryers and charcoal filters. High-tech equipment is not 'appropriate technology' in this context.

questions.question: Name one way a caregiver can 'create time' (Minutes) for HBC.
questions.explanation: Time is managed by planning, punctuality, and sharing tasks.

questions.question: Who is included in 'Manpower' resources for HBC?

options.text: Health workers, family, volunteers, and community leaders

questions.explanation: Manpower includes professionals, family, and community volunteers.

questions.question: Money for HBC can only be provided by the government.
questions.explanation: Money can come from families, communities (Harambee), NGOs, and insurance, in addition to the government.

questions.question: What is the role of the nurse regarding 'Materials' resources?

options.text: To buy everything for the patient
To know what is available, where to get it, and how to procure it
To sell materials to patients for profit

questions.explanation: The nurse must know sources (NGOs, hospital stores) and procedures (forms) to mobilise materials.

questions.question: Which of the following are sources of 'Material' resources? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: Materials can be sourced from the facility, NGOs, private purchase, or donations.
